snippet.title: Imperialism - Official Trailer 1997
snippet.description:
Official trailer for Imperialism, a turn-based strategy game with 4X elements based on historic scenarios of the 19th century. Published April 1997.

Imperialism release dates
- Apple Mac: 31 August 1997
- Windows PC: 31 August 1997

Imperialism is available DRM-free from GOG: https://www.gog.com/game/imperialism?pp=15664c029f5800776b362386d6e8bce48cdc54f7
